resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A simulation of air pollution from chimney stacks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation der Luftverschmutzung von den 
Kaminstapeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation de la pollution atmosphérique des 
piles de cheminée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação da poluição de ar das pilhas da 
chaminé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione di inquinamento atmosferico dalle 
pile del camino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση της ατμοσφαιρικής ρύπανσης από τις 
στοίβες καπνοδόχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación de la contaminación atmosférica 
de pilas de la chimenea</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A quantitative simulation which provides a model to measure the level of pollution from emission of nearby chimney stacks. The user can feed in relevant data and receive a graphic output of the amount of pollution at various distances from the source of emission.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environmental science</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine quantitative Simulation, die ein Modell 
liefert, um die Stufe der Verunreinigung von der Emission des nahe 
gelegenen Kamins zu messen, stapelt. Der Benutzer kann relevante
Daten innen einziehen und eine graphische Ausgabe der Menge von 
Verunreinigung in verschiedenen Abständen von der Quelle der Emission
empfangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation quantitative qui fournit un modèle 
pour mesurer le niveau de la pollution de l'émission de la cheminée 
voisine empile. L'utilisateur peut charger des données 
appropriées et recevoir un résultat graphique de la quantité de 
pollution à de diverses distances de la source d'émission.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação quantitative que forneça um modelo
para medir o nível da poluição da emissão da chaminé próxima 
empilha. O usuário pode alimentar dentro dados relevantes e 
receber uma saída gráfica da quantidade de poluição em várias 
distâncias da fonte da emissão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione quantitativa che fornisce un 
modello per misurare il livello di inquinamento da emissione al del 
camino vicino impila. L'utente può caricare i dati relativi e 
ricevere un'uscita grafica della quantità di inquinamento alle varie 
distanze dalla sorgente di emissione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ποσοτική προσομοίωση που παρέχει ένα μοντέλο για 
να μετρήσει το επίπεδο ρύπανσης από την εκπομπή των κοντινών 
στοιβών καπνοδόχων. Ο χρήστης μπορεί να ταϊ'σει στα 
σχετικά στοιχεία και να λάβει μια γραφική έξοδο του ποσού 
ρύπανσης στις διάφορες αποστάσεις από την πηγή εκπομπής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación cuantitativa que proporciona a un 
modelo para medir el nivel de la contaminación de la emisión de la 
chimenea próxima empila. El utilizador puede alimentar adentro 
datos relevantes y recibir una salida gráfica de la cantidad de 
contaminación en las varias distancias de la fuente de la emisión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftverschmutzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimawissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pollution atmosphérique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poluição de ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inquinamento atmosferico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβαλλοντική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contaminación atmosférica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
